title: Anejo Rum Punch Recipe
full_text:
Anejo Rum Punch Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Chilling Time
4 hrs
Total
4 hrs 5 mins
Serves
6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
freshly squeezed juice
from
6 to 8
whole
limes
1 1/2
cups
aged
rum
6
tablespoons
orange curaçao
6
dashes
Angostura bitters
1 1/2
cups
ginger beer
1 1/2
cups
ice
, plus more for serving
6
orange
slices
Directions
In a large pitcher, stir lime juice, rum, orange curaçao, and Angostura bitters. At this point, punch can be covered and refrigerated for up to 4 hours.
When ready to serve, add ice and ginger beer to punch mixture and stir gently. Serve in ice-filled glasses, garnished with orange slices.
Special equipment
Citrus juicer
Gin
